## Timeline

- 3:30pm: Load Bus at football stadium
- 3:45pm: Depart for Berea
- 4:45pm: Arrive at Berea 
- 5:30pm-5:40pm: Women begin warm up
- 6:00pm-6:10pm: Men begin warm up
- 6:15pm: Women report to start
- 6:30pm Women's Race Start
- 6:45pm: Men report to start
- 7:00pm Men's Race start
